#!/usr/bin/env bash
apt update
apt install -y curl

get_latest_release() {
  curl -sSL "https://api.github.com/repos/$1/releases/latest" |
  grep '"tag_name":' |
  sed -E 's/.*"([^"]+)".*/\1/'
}

PACKAGE="feather-rs/feather"
VERSION=`get_latest_release "${PACKAGE}"`
echo "Latest version=${VERSION}"

cd /mnt/server

curl -sSLo feather.tar.gz https://github.com/caelunshun/feather/releases/download/${VERSION}/feather-${VERSION}-linux.tar.gz

tar --strip-components=1 -xzvf feather.tar.gz

rm feather.tar.gz
